desc: A book by author and award winning photographer, Peter Adams. Other books include The Street Wise, Ore What!, Who Shot That? The Digital Female Nude, Under The Skin, Bits of Rust.

layout.text:
By Peter Adams.
“Peter is one of the few who understands
that a portrait needs a bit of
the photographer and a bit of the subject.
The trick is finding the right balance between the two.”
– Arnold Newman, USA.
